products.description:
Brand TerraMaster

Color Silver

Material Aluminum alloy

Product Dimensions 6.3"W x 13.8"L x19.7"H (IN)

products.fullDescription:
TerraMaster D16 Thunderbolt 3 Hardware RAID Storage - More Power, More Speed. The TerraMaster D16Thunderbolt 3 is ideal for small- and medium-sized enterprises in need of high-speed, large-capacity storage for content creation, perfect for creators working on applications like Final Cut Pro X, Lightroom, Resolve, and others. The RAID storage also comes with two 40Gb/s Thunderbolt 3 ports that are fully compatible with the latest Big Sur system version, supporting full 4K/8K video performance.
Daisy-chain up to 6 devices Capitalizing on the Thunderbolt 3 and DP1.4 interfaces, the D16 thunderbolt 3 supports multi-screen displays with up to 3 monitors or daisy-chain up to 6 devices. This is an ideal solution for multitaskers, especially when efficiency is the end goal. The Thunderbolt 2 devices with the daisy-chain function can also be daisy-chained to the D16 Thunderbolt 3. To use the device, your system should satisfy the requirements below: · Operating System: 64-bit Windows 8/10 or later; MAC OS X 10.12 or Version later. · Hardware Requirement: CPU i5 Quad-Core or higher; · Memory: Minimum 4GB; · Interface: Thunderbolt 3 or 2; If your device has only the USB ports, it will not be compatible. · Applicable Hard Drive: 3.5" SATA enterprise hard drive, SSHD hybrid hard drive, NAS hard drive (SATA III or above), or 2.5" SSD (SATA II or above).
  • [Veritable Hardware RAID Controller] D16-Thunderbolt3 is equipped with the latest dedicated RAID chip and high-speed cache memory to complete all RAID processing, which can provide true high-performance hardware RAID protection to ensure stable and high-performance data transmission. It issuitable for a video editor that works with real-time multi-channel HD and 8K video streams. Starting from March 26th, 2021, Mac with M1 security chip was fully supported.
  • [Lightning Fast Dtorage for Video Editing] Drawing on a pair of Thunderbolt 3 interfaces (40 Gbps) and a hardware RAID controller, the D16 Thunderbolt 3 can operate at transfer speeds of 2100 MB/s in RAID 0 array mode with 16 SSDs. Under RAID 5, the device can achieve a speed of 1800 MB/s. It works with the computers with Thunderbolt 3 or 4 port, NOT compatible with USB port.
  • [Incredible Capacity up to 1PB] Multiple hardware RAID: RAID 0/1/5/6/10/50, JBOD, Single. Support up to 320TB storage capacity (20TB x 16, in RAID 0), hard drives not included, users need to purchase as needed. Support both 3.5” SATA disks and 2.5” SSDs. Other storage devices can be daisy-chained via Thunderbolt 3 – so six linked D16 Thunderbolt 3 units can achieve an enormous 1PB of on-site storage.
  • The D16 is both quiet and compact enough to be placed on a desktop in the working area, with a similar footprint to a typical tower PC. Even under full load, the D16’s high-quality silent fan and specially optimized interior structure help increase the internal air flow of the device to reduce the disk temperature, as well as greatly reducing resonance and noise. D16 has a specially designed handle that makes it easy to carry, facilitating the work of video production teams.
  • [One Device with Multifunctions] Capitalizing on the Thunderbolt3 and DP interface, the D16 thunderbolt3 supports multi-screen displays with up to 3 monitors or daisy-chain up to 6 devices to create the smartest workspace. This is an ideal solution for multitaskers, especially when efficiency is the end goal.

products.fullDescription:
TERRAMASTER D8-332 Thunderbolt 3 RAID storage - More Power, More Speed.
Equipped with two Thunderbolt 3 interfaces, the D8-332 Thunderbolt 3 RAID storage enables users to connect with any USB device at 8 times the speed of USB3.0, while supporting full 4K video performance.
Boost Performance Using Hardware RAID
Software RAID consumes extensive resources on your computer system, which affects the efficiency of your other tasks. Moreover, unexpected power outages come with the substantial risk of data corruption for the backed up software RAID. TerraMaster’s D8-332 Thunderbolt 3 features professional-grade hardware RAID and on-board flash memory to provide faster, more efficient backup and restore capabilities, enhancing your performance and providing additional fail-safes.
  • [Veritable Hardware RAID Controller] The D8-332 Thunderbolt 3 storage is equipped with the latest dedicated RAID chip and high-speed cache memory to complete all RAID processing, which can provide true high-performance hardware RAID protection to ensure stable and high-performance data transmission. This 8-Bay Thunderbolt 3 storage is suitable for video editors working with real-time multi-channel HD and 4K video streams.
  • [Lightning Fast Storage for Video Editing] Drawing on a pair of Thunderbolt 3 interfaces (40Gbps) and a hardware RAID controller, the D8-332 Thunderbolt 3 storage can operate at transferring speeds of 1600 MB/s 1600 MB/s in reading, and 1400MB/s in writing (tested by 8 SSD, in raid 0, Windows OS). It works with the computers with Thunderbolt 3 or 4 port, NOT compatible with USB port.
  • [Large-Capacity Storage] Multiple hardware RAID: RAID 0/1/5/10/JBOD, Single. Support up to 160TB storage capacity (20TB x 8, in RAID 0); users can also daisy-chain with other Thunderbolt 3 storage devices via the Thunderbolt 3 interface, which can achieve an enormous 960 TB capacity by linking together six D8-332 Thunderbolt 3 devices.
  • [One Device with Multifunctions] Capitalizing on the Thunderbolt3 and DP interface, the D8-332 Thunderbolt 3 storage supports multi-screen displays with up to 3 monitors or daisy-chain up to 6 devices to create the smartest workspace. This is an ideal solution for multitaskers, especially when efficiency is the end goal.
  • [Professional and Safe] Equipped with 3*80-mm inbuilt temperature-controlled smart fans ensure excellent heat dispersion. In addition, its sturdy and durable, metal body and humanized design with double handles can be easily and safely moved to meet the needs of the studio and field work.

products.name: terramaster-d6-320-external-hard-drive-enclosure---usb-3-2-gen2-10gbps-type-c-hdd-storage-hot-swappable-plug-and-play
products.title: TERRAMASTER D6-320 External Hard Drive Enclosure - USB 3.2 Gen2 10Gbps Type-C HDD Storage Hot Swappable Plug and Play
products.description:
Brand TerraMaster

Color Silver

Material Aluminum alloy

Product Dimensions 5"W x 9"L x9"H (IN)

Item Weight 8.5LB
products.fullDescription:
High-speed data transfer and massive storage capacity
The D6-320 hard drive enclosure features a USB3.2 Gen2 interface providing a 10Gbps data transmission bandwidth. With the capability to support up to six 3.5" and 2.5" SATA HDD, and 2.5" SATA SSD, it offers a maximum drive capacity of 22TB and a storage space of up to 132TB (22TB x 6). When six hard drives are installed (SATA III HDD 8TB x 6 simultaneously read/write), it delivers an actual read/write speed of up to 1,030MB/s, while a single SSD installation (SATA III 1TB SSD x 1) can reach a read speed of 510MB/s. Please note that the D6-320 does not support the function of array and only supports individual disks.
Highly Compatible Interface
The D6-320 USB storage comes with a 1-meter USB Type-C to Type-C cable and is plug-and-play, requiring no drivers. It is compatible with a range of computer interfaces, including USB 3.0/3.1/3.2, Thunderbolt 3/4.
Hot Swappable, Intelligent Disk Sleep
The D6-320 HDD storage allows hot swapping for convenient hard disk replacement while powered on. It supports the sleep function to reduce power consumption and extend the hard disk's service life by following the computer OS's sleep mode.
Better Heat Dissipation
The D6-320 HDD enclosure features a temperature-controlled fan that adjusts its speed according to the hard disk's temperature for optimal performance. Its internal structure is optimized to increase air pressure, reduce hard disk temperature, and minimize noise and resonance. These features enable the D6-320 to operate quietly even under heavy load.
Expansion of NAS Storage Space
The D6-320 DAS storage is compatible with TerraMaster NAS via USB interface with proper adaptation. Users can expand the NAS storage space by creating arrays and storage pools on D6-320 through TerraMaster TOS. Note: this feature requires TerraMaster NAS with TOS 5.1 or later version.
  • High Speed: The D6-320 hard drive enclosure adopts USB 3.2 Gen2 protocol for high-speed data transmission up to 10Gbps. With 6 hard drives installed, the read/write speed can reach up to 1,030MB/s (SATA III HDD 8TB x 6). With one SSD installed, the read speed can reach 510MB/s (SATA III 1TB SSD x 1).
  • Super-large Storage Space: The D6-320 HDD storage enclosure can support up to six 3.5" and 2.5" SATA HDD, as well as 2.5" SATA SSD, with a maximum capacity of 22TB per drive, providing users with up to 132TB (22TB x 6) of storage space. Note that the D6-320 does not support arrays and only works with individual disks.
  • Plug and Play, Highly Compatible: The D6-320 das storage is a plug-and-play device that doesn't require drivers to work. It is highly compatible with MAC, Windows, and Linux operating systems. It has a USB Type-C interface and comes with a USB type C-type C cable. The device is compatible with various computer interfaces, including USB 3.0, USB 3.1, USB 3.2, Thunderbolt 3, and Thunderbolt 4.
  • Hot Swappable: The D6-320 USB enclosure supports hot swapping, which allows you to replace the hard disk without having to power off the device. This feature makes data transfer more convenient and efficient.

products.fullDescription:
Large Capacity RAID Storage with Multiple RAID Modes TerraMaster D5-300 is desktop 5-bay RAID storage with USB 3.1 high-speed interface, equipped with 5 drive slots, supports a drive capacity of up to 20TB, and a maximum total storage capacity of up to 100TB. D5-300 Supports multiple RAID modes: RAID 0, RAID 1, RAID 5, RAID 10, CLONE, JBOD, and Single Disk. Professionals can choose one or more according to their application scenarios. The D5-300 with massive capacity and safe RAID levels ideal for storing photos, videos, documents, and music. The D5-300 is NOT a NAS, it is a DAS (direct attached storage).
If Windows Defender blocked RAID Manager during the installation process, please be sure to select “Trust” in the pop-up prompt.
  • D5-300 is equipped with brand new USB 3.1(Gen1) type-C high-speed interface and compatible with Mac (not compatible with mac OS 14 and above), Windows and Linux computers, and also works with the computers possessing the Thunderbolt 3 interface.
  • Up to 100TB storage capacity. D5-300 can support five (5) SATA hard drives, is compatible with 20TB 3.5 inch SATA hard drive, and has a total storage capacity up to 100TB ( in RAID0). Compatible with various hard drives including 3.5" SATA hard drives, 2.5" SATA hard drives and SSD. (Note: users need to purchase their own hard drives. HDD's are not included.)
  • Relying on the USB 3.1 Gen1 super speed protocol, the D5-300’s transmission speeds can reach up to 220MB/s (Tested with dedicated NAS drives 4TB RAID 0).
  • Supports multiple RAID modes: RAID 0, RAID 1, RAID 5, RAID 10, CLONE, JBOD, and Single Disk. RAID 5 is recommended as the best option for D5-300, which balances between data security and storage capacity.
  • Various applications. Great for video editing, photo backup, storage of R&D technical documents, archival backup, music libraries, financial records, storage of video surveillance recordings and corporate data storage. Featuring an aluminum-alloy shell and low-noise fans, D5-300 is extremely solid and reliable with good heat dissipation capabilities and low noise production.

products.name: terramaster-u8-450-nas-server---rackmount-2u-8-bay-network-attached-storage-with-atom-c3558r-quad-core-cpu--8gb-ddr4-memory--du
products.title: TERRAMASTER U8-450 NAS Server – Rackmount 2U 8-Bay Network Attached Storage with Atom C3558R Quad-core CPU, 8GB DDR4 Memory, Du
products.description:
Brand TerraMaster

Color Silver

Material Aluminum alloy

Product Dimensions 15.11"W x 17.32"L x3.54"H (IN)

Item Weight 15.9LB
products.fullDescription:
Built for High-speed Storage
The NAS server 2U 8-Bay rackmount U8-450 is powered by an Atom C3558R quad-core processor, with main frequency of up to 2.4GHz. It also features 8GB DDR4 dual-channel memory (expandable up to 32GB); dual SFP+ 10GB fiber interfaces; and dual 2.5GbE ports, providing up to 20Gb transmission bandwidth through Link Aggregation. In addition, the U8-450 features dual M.2 NVMe SSD slots and TerraMaster's Hyper Cache SSD cache acceleration technology, which can improve the overall performance of the NAS.
Simultaneous Teamwork
By building a 10-gigabit network, multiple Windows/Mac workstations can connect to the U8-450 NAS storage simultaneously, making collaborative operations such as online editing of multi-track 4K material, special effects, video composition, and shot clip import and output faster and more efficient. This significantly improves work efficiency and reduces production time.
An Abundance of Data Storage Space
The U8-450 network attached storage supports up to 8*22TB hard drives for a maximum internal raw capacity of 176TB. It is compatible with both 3.5" and 2.5" SATA HDDs and 2.5" SATA SSDs, and supports RAID 0/1/5/6/10. With its large storage capacity, the U8-450 can store 60 million HD photos, 36 million working documents, 80,000 HD movies, and 8 million downloadable music files. This allows users to back up data from their Windows PCs, Macs, mobile phones, HDD enclosures, and network disks to the U8-450 for centralized management, providing an extra layer of security against data loss.
Unique Hyper Cache SSD Cache Acceleration Technology
The U8-450 NAS enclosure features TerraMaster's unique Hyper Cache SSD cache acceleration technology, which offers users a choice of three different cache modes designed to suit different usage requirements. In addition, the U8-450 can create disk arrays for the SSDs, improving cache speed and security. The Hyper Cache technology can improve storage performance by up to 100%, providing users with more efficient and reliable hybrid storage.
Rich Backup Solutions
The U8-450 cloud storage supports multiple backup applications, including Centralized Backup, Duple Backup, Snapshot, CloudSync, TerraSync, Rsync Backup, and more, providing users with a range of options for data backup. The U8-450 network attached storage uses visual user interfaces and reliable storage technologies to ensure the safety and security of users' data.
  • Powerful Hardware: Featuring a robust Atom C3558R Quad-core 2.4GHz CPU, 8GB DDR4 RAM (expandable up to 32GB), dual SFP+ 10GbE Ports, and dual 2.5GbE RJ45 Ports, this NAS storage provides a remarkable transmission bandwidth of up to 20Gb through Link Aggregation. Additionally, the two built-in M.2 2280 NVMe SSD slots support SSD cache acceleration, significantly enhancing storage efficiency.
  • High-speed 10Gb Network Sharing: The U8-450 NAS server supports 10Gb network connectivity, enabling simultaneous connections of multiple Windows/Mac workstations. This facilitates seamless collaborative editing of multi-track 4K media, special effects production, video synthesis, and import/export of clips using popular video editing software like Edius, Adobe Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve, and Final Cut Pro.
  • Compact Rack-mounted Server: Featuring a compact 2U Rackmount case with a depth of only 384mm (15.1 inches) and weighing a mere 6.8kgs, the U8-450 NAS optimizes space utilization. Its simple installation, which doesn't require rails, makes it compatible with most 2-column cabinets, small wall-mounted cabinets, and various locations such as machine rooms, storage rooms, staircases, and offices.
  • Diverse Backup Solutions: The U8-450 network attached storage offers a range of backup applications, including Centralized Backup, Duple Backup, Snapshot, CloudSync, and more, ensuring data reliability. These backup solutions provide robust measures and ensure the well-being of your valuable information.
  • Reliable Data Security and Restoration: With TRAID support, the U8-450 NAS storage ensures the preservation of data integrity by mitigating the effects of hard disk damage. The system also facilitates regular snapshots, allowing for quick restoration to specific points in time as required. Additionally, the TerraMaster one-click Security Isolation Mode offers emergency defense against malicious attacks. Rest assured that your data remains safeguarded and recoverable, even in urgent situations.

  • Powerful Hardware: N5095 Quad-core 2.0GHz CPU, 4GB RAM DDR4 (expandable up to 32GB). Dual 2.5-Gigabit Ethernet ports - Supports up to 5 Gbps under Link Aggregation. Rackmount 1U 4-Bay NAS designed for SMB High Performance Requirements.
  • Maximum Internal Raw Capacity: 80TB (20 TB drive x 4). Compatible with 3.5" and 2.5" SATA HDD, 2.5" SATA SSD. Supports RAID 0/1/ 5/6/10, Supports online capacity expansion and online migration. The built-in M.2 2280 NVMe SSD slot can realize SSD cache acceleration and increase the storage efficiency of the disk array several times.
  • Multiple Backup Solutions: Centralized Backup, Duple Backup, Snapshot, CloudSync, enhance the Safety of your Data with multiple backup applications.
  • Easily build file storage servers, mail servers, web servers, FTP servers, MySQL databases, CRM systems, Node.js, and Java virtual machines, as well as a host of other commercial applications.
  • Small-sized compact design, fit for any rack cabinet. Features metal shell and intelligent temperature control ultra-quiet fan, good in heat dissipation and quiet.

products.name: terramaster-t12-450-12bay-nas-storage-network-attached-storage-with-atom-c3558r-quad-core-cpu--8gb-ddr4-memory--dual-sfp--10gbe
products.title: TERRAMASTER T12-450 12Bay NAS Storage Network Attached Storage with Atom C3558R Quad-core CPU, 8GB DDR4 Memory, Dual SFP+ 10GbE
products.description:
Brand TerraMaster

Color Silver

Material Aluminum alloy

Product Dimensions 6.31"W x 11.61"L x 13.15"H (IN)

Item Weight 21.2LB
products.fullDescription:
Built for High-speed Storage
The NAS server 12-Bay T12-450 is powered by an Atom C3558R quad-core processor, with main frequency of up to 2.4GHz. It also features 8GB DDR4 dual-channel memory (expandable up to 32GB); dual SFP+ 10GB fiber interfaces; and dual 2.5GbE ports, providing up to 20Gb transmission bandwidth through Link Aggregation. In addition, the T12-450 features dual M.2 NVMe SSD slots and TerraMaster's Hyper Cache SSD cache acceleration technology, which can improve the overall performance of the NAS.
Simultaneous Teamwork
By building a 10-gigabit network, multiple Windows/Mac workstations can connect to the T12-450 NAS storage simultaneously, making collaborative operations such as online editing of multi-track 4K material, special effects, video composition, and shot clip import and output faster and more efficient. This significantly improves work efficiency and reduces production time.
An Abundance of Data Storage Space
The T12-450 network attached storage supports up to 12*20TB hard drives for a maximum internal raw capacity of 240TB. It is compatible with both 3.5" and 2.5" SATA HDDs and 2.5" SATA SSDs, and supports RAID 0/1/5/6/10. With its large storage capacity, the T12-450 can store 60 million HD photos, 36 million working documents, 80,000 HD movies, and 8 million downloadable music files. This allows users to back up data from their Windows PCs, Macs, mobile phones, HDD enclosures, and network disks to the T12-450 for centralized management, providing an extra layer of protection against data loss.
Unique Hyper Cache SSD Cache Acceleration Technology
The T12-450 NAS enclosure features TerraMaster's unique Hyper Cache SSD cache acceleration technology, which offers users a choice of three different cache modes designed to suit different usage requirements. In addition, the T12-450 can create disk arrays for the SSDs, improving cache speed and security. The Hyper Cache technology can improve storage performance by up to 100%, providing users with more efficient and reliable hybrid storage.
Rich Backup Solutions
The T12-450 cloud storage supports multiple backup applications, including Centralized Backup, Duple Backup, Snapshot, CloudSync, TerraSync, Rsync Backup, and more, providing users with a range of options for data backup and protection. The T12-450 network attached storage uses visual user interfaces and reliable storage technologies to ensure the safety and security of users' data.
  • Powerful Hardware: Features an Atom C3558R Quad-core 2.4GHz CPU, 8GB RAM DDR4 (expandable up to 32GB), dual SFP+ 10Gb Ethernet Interfaces, dual 2.5GbE Ports - providing up to 20Gb transmission bandwidth through Link Aggregation. The two built-in M.2 2280 NVMe SSD slots support SSD cache acceleration, significantly improving storage efficiency. This high-speed 12bay NAS is designed for users with demanding storage performance requirements, such as 4K image editing, virtualization, and databases.
  • High-speed 10Gb Network Sharing: The T12-450 NAS server supports 10Gb network connectivity, allowing multiple Windows/Mac workstations to connect simultaneously. This enables seamless collaborative editing of multi-track 4K media, special effects production, video synthesis, and import/export of clips using various video editing software such as Edius, Adobe Premiere Pro, and DaVinci Resolve.
  • Multiple Backup Solutions: The T12-450 cloud storage Features multiple backup applications including Centralized Backup, Duple Backup, Snapshot, CloudSync and more to enhance the safety of your data. These backup solutions ensure that your data is safe and secure at all times.
  • Reliable Data Protection and Restoration: The T12-450 network attached storage offers reliable data protection with support for TRAID, preventing data loss due to hard disk damage. The NAS system supports regular snapshots, allowing for quick restoration to a specific point in time when necessary. The TerraMaster one-click Security Isolation Mode provides emergency protection against virus and ransomware attacks.
  • Compact Design: Features a small, space-saving design that can be used vertically or horizontally. The T12-450 NAS storage has a metal shell and intelligent temperature control ultra-quiet fan, which helps with heat dissipation and keeps the system very quiet.

products.fullDescription:
Designed for SMB with High Performance Requirements
The NAS server 12-Bay T12-423 is suitable for SMB users who need high-performance storage solutions. High performance means that users can easily handle high-load assignments, while multiple business-level backup solutions ensure data safety and prevent the potential risk of data loss.
Excellent Performance
The NAS enclosure uses a Celeron N5095 quad-core processor with 2.0 GHz and maximum turbo to 2.9 GHz. It is integrated with a GPU graphics card, AES NI hardware encryption, and equipped with two 2.5 GbE interfaces and 8GB DDR4 dual-channel memory (expandable up to 32 GB).
Multiple Backup Solutions
Integrated with multiple backup applications including Centralized Backup, Duple Backup, CloudSync, TerraSync, and more, this computer network attached storage uses visual user interfaces and reliable storage technologies to protect your precious data.
Powerful Multimedia Service
With 4K video decoding capability, the T12-423 media server is compatible with uPnP/DLNA protocol and can stream videos to various multimedia devices, including computers, smart phones, media players and televisions.
Higher Transmission Speed
The T12-423 NAS storage is configured with two 2.5 GbE interfaces, supporting 2.5 GbE high-speed network bandwidth. The transmission speed can reach 283 MB/s (dedicated NAS hard drives 18TB x 2, RAID 0). Link Aggregation provides a network bandwidth up to 5 Gb.
  • Powerful Hardware: N5095 Quad-core 2.0GHz CPU, 8GB RAM DDR4 (expandable up to 32GB). Dual 2.5-Gigabit Ethernet ports - Supports up to 5 Gbps under Link Aggregation. 12Bay NAS designed for SMB High Performance Requirements.
  • Maximum Internal Raw Capacity: 240TB (20 TB drive x 12). Compatible with 3.5" and 2.5" SATA HDD, 2.5" SATA SSD. Supports RAID 0/1/ 5/6/10, Supports online capacity expansion and online migration. The built-in M.2 2280 NVMeSSD slot can realize SSD cache acceleration and increase the storage efficiency of the disk array several times.
  • Multiple Backup Solutions: CentralizedBackup, DupleBackup, Snapshot, CloudSync, enhance the Safety of your Data with multiple backup applications.
  • Easily build file storage servers, mail servers, web servers, FTP servers, MySQL databases, CRM systems, Node.js, and Java virtual machines, as well as a host of other commercial applications.
  • Small-sized compact design; can be used vertically and horizontally. The cloud storage features an metal shell and intelligent temperature control ultra-quiet fan, good in heat dissipation and Very Quiet.

products.name: terramaster-f2-212-2bay-nas---quad-core-cpu-ddr4-ram-personal-private-cloud-home-network-attached-storage-with-rich-backup-solu-1
products.title: TERRAMASTER F2-212 2Bay NAS - Quad Core CPU DDR4 RAM Personal Private Cloud Home Network Attached Storage with Rich Backup Solu
products.description:
Brand TerraMaster

Color Black

Material Plastic

Product Dimensions 4.78"W x 4.69"L x 4"H (IN)

Item Weight 4.41LB
products.fullDescription:
TERRAMASTER F2-212 - Your Ultimate 2-Bay Home Network Storage Solution
The F2-212 is an updated version of the previous generation F2-210. The F2-212 features a more powerful ARM V8.2 Cortex-A55 64-bit 1.7GHz quad-core processor with built-in floating point unit (FPU) and NEON SIMD engine, 1GB DDR4, and advanced video DSP hardware acceleration. Moreover, it boasts enhanced 4K video encoding and decoding capabilities, making it ideal for home document backup and multimedia entertainment.
New Operating System
The F2-212 NAS server runs the new operating system TOS 5, which adds more than 50 new functions and 600 improvements compared with the previous generation. The new features meet more business requirements, as well as significantly improving response speed, security, and ease of use.
Home Data Center
The F2-212 file server supports up to 22TB of hard drive, and the total capacity can reach 44TB. It can store 15 million HD photos, 9 million working documents, 20,000 HD movies, and 2 million downloadable music, enabling you to back up the data in Windows PC, MAC computer, mobile phone, HDD enclosure, and network disk to TNAS for centralized management. This adequately prevents data loss resulting from hardware malfunction or ransomware.
Home Multimedia Center
The F2-212 cloud storage features powerful 4K video hardware decoding capability, and is compatible with uPnP/DLNA protocol. With TerraMaster’s dedicated "Multimedia Server" app or third-party multimedia servers (Emby, Plex), it can stream videos to a variety of multimedia devices including smart phones, tablets, Roku, Apple TV, Google Chromecast, Amazon Fire TV, and smart TV, delivering users constant, reliable entertainment experiences.
More Flexible Mobile Access
Users can access the TNAS device anytime and anywhere on any iOS or Android mobile client, allowing users to browse files, back up albums and share photos whenever they want. The TerraMaster mobile client is even equipped with a mobile administrator for easy remote management of your TNAS at home, further improving the flexibility of use.
  • The Ultimate Home Network Storage Solution: The F2-212 NAS storage is an affordable and high-performance 2-bay NAS optimized for home and SOHO users, running the latest TOS 5.1 operating system.
  • Powerful Hardware: The F2-212 network attached storage adopts an ARM v8 quad-core 1.7GHz CPU with 1GB RAM (NOT upgradeable). This NAS server features powerful 4K video hardware decoding capability, and is compatible with uPnP/DLNA protocol, making it an ideal solution to serve as home multimedia center.
  • Across-Platform File Services: The F2-212 file server supports all mainstream file services: SMB, NFS, SFTP/FTP, AFP, iSCSI, WebDAV; and is provided with multiple permission management of users, user groups, and folder, meeting across-platform file services in various network environments.
  • Rich Backup Solutions: The F2-212 backup solution can provide robust measures and ensure the well-being of your valuable information by using its visual user interfaces and trustworthy storage solutions thanks to its integration with multiple backup applications such as Duple Backup, TSSS, TFM Backup, CloudSync and more, which can address backup needs in any circumstances.
  • Simple & Fast System Installation: TerraMaster provides a hands-on online tutorials and videos, with a specially designed "Default mode" to set all configurations to optimal home mode, so all the steps can be completed after the first initial system installation in just a few minutes. The 2bay NAS is compatible with 3.5" and 2.5" SATA HDD, 2.5" SATA SSD. Each bay supports the HDD up to 22TB (Total of 44TB in RAID 0). For stable performance, dedicated NAS drives are recommemded.
